headline: Las Vegas Sands Faces Macau Market Challenges Despite Attractive Valuation, Says JPMorgan
summary: Las Vegas Sands Corp. (NYSE:LVS) ranks among the best cyclical stocks to buy now. On June 23, JPMorgan set a price target of $47 and began coverage of Las Vegas Sands Corp. (NYSE:LVS) with a Neutral rating. With a valuation nine times the casino operator’s projected 2026 enterprise value to EBITDA ratio, the investment bank’s […]
